cat.name: Cat
cat.description: An agile little kitten showcasing the full capabilities of the plugin system. Start from a mysterious egg and grow into a legendary creature of arcane, feral, or mechanical path.

nine_lives.name: Nine Lives
nine_lives.description: 30% chance to resurrect on death with 25% health restored

purr_heal.name: Purr Heal
purr_heal.description: Consume energy to heal yourself through purring, restoring 15 health

night_owl.name: Night Owl
night_owl.description: More active at night, +50% evolution points from nighttime interactions

picky_eater.name: Picky Eater
picky_eater.description: Quite picky about food, but in a better mood when fed

normal: Click... (light tapping from the shell)
Thump... (faint knocking sound)
Creak... (vibration inside the shell)
... (waiting quietly)

happy: Meow~
Meow meow~
Meoww~
Purr~
Meow?
Purr~
normal: Meow~
Meow meow~
Meoww~
Purr~
Meow?
Purr~
unhappy: Meow...
Meoww~
Purr~

happy: Meow! I can feel the magic flowing~
Just learned a new spell! Meow✨
This magic circle is so interesting!
Magic has made me stronger!
Meow~ I can foresee a little bit of the future!
normal: Meow! I can feel the magic flowing~
Just learned a new spell! Meow✨
This magic circle is so interesting!
Magic has made me stronger!
Meow~ I can foresee a little bit of the future!
sad: The magic seems to be fading...
Magic requires focus, but I'm too hungry meow...
I always feel a bit weak when casting spells...
miserable: The magic seems to be fading...
Magic requires focus, but I'm too hungry meow...
I always feel a bit weak when casting spells...
unhappy: Today's magic didn't go well...
Need a rest, meow~
Need to recharge a bit.

happy: Hey! Let's spar a bit! Meow~
My claws have gotten sharper!
Just defeated a virtual mouse!
Phew... Warm-up complete! Ready for more!
The feeling of battle makes my fur stand up!
normal: Hey! Let's spar a bit! Meow~
My claws have gotten sharper!
Just defeated a virtual mouse!
Phew... Warm-up complete! Ready for more!
The feeling of battle makes my fur stand up!
sad: Haven't had a good fight in a long time...
miserable: Haven't had a good fight in a long time...
unhappy: Not in good form today...
Need to recover some energy, meow~
Let's rest a bit before fighting.

happy: System startup complete! All modules running normally meow~
Armor assembly complete!
Mechanical arm calibration successful!
Energy reserves: 100%, meow!
Ready! Starting mission!
normal: System startup complete! All modules running normally meow~
Armor assembly complete!
Mechanical arm calibration successful!
Energy reserves: 100%, meow!
Ready! Starting mission!
sad: Low battery... need to recharge meow...
miserable: Low battery... need to recharge meow...
unhappy: Anomaly detected... need inspection meow~
Temperature high, need cooling.
Calibration delayed, meow~

happy: I've mastered powerful shadow magic meow~
If you have any questions, feel free to ask me meow~
This world is full of magic, so beautiful meow~
Protecting loved ones is my mission meow!
Let's explore the mysteries of magic together meow~
normal: I've mastered powerful shadow magic meow~
If you have any questions, feel free to ask me meow~
This world is full of magic, so beautiful meow~
Protecting loved ones is my mission meow!
Let's explore the mysteries of magic together meow~
sad: The shadows are fading... maybe it's just my imagination meow...
I need some time to recover meow~
miserable: The shadows are fading... maybe it's just my imagination meow...
I need some time to recover meow~
unhappy: Meditation has made me more aware of my situation meow~
Don't worry, I'll get better slowly.
Sometimes I need some alone time meow~

happy: The power of crystal prophecy flows within me meow~
I can see fragments of the future meow~
Your destiny is very special, I'm looking forward to it meow~
Let's create a beautiful future together meow~
The light of the crystals guides us forward meow~
normal: The power of crystal prophecy flows within me meow~
I can see fragments of the future meow~
Your destiny is very special, I'm looking forward to it meow~
Let's create a beautiful future together meow~
The light of the crystals guides us forward meow~
sad: The prophecy has become blurry meow...
Need to rest a bit to recover my prophetic abilities meow...
miserable: The prophecy has become blurry meow...
Need to rest a bit to recover my prophetic abilities meow...
unhappy: Today's prophecy wasn't very accurate meow~
There might be some interference...
Tomorrow will be better meow~

happy: The power of flames has fully awakened meow~
Nothing can stop my pace meow!
The flames of justice will purify all evil meow!
Being able to protect friends is the most important thing meow~
Training has made me even stronger!
normal: The power of flames has fully awakened meow~
Nothing can stop my pace meow!
The flames of justice will purify all evil meow!
Being able to protect friends is the most important thing meow~
Training has made me even stronger!
sad: The flames have weakened... maybe it's my imagination meow...
miserable: The flames have weakened... maybe it's my imagination meow...
unhappy: Sometimes, power isn't everything meow~
I'll reflect on my shortcomings meow~
Tomorrow is a new beginning meow!

happy: The power of extreme cold is fully under control meow~
Everything seems so pure meow~
Calmness is my nature meow~
Speed and power, I have both meow~
Winter is the best time for me to fight meow~
normal: The power of extreme cold is fully under control meow~
Everything seems so pure meow~
Calmness is my nature meow~
Speed and power, I have both meow~
Winter is the best time for me to fight meow~
sad: The frost is melting... is my power weakening meow...
I need to find my calm again...
Please forgive my poor condition meow...
miserable: The frost is melting... is my power weakening meow...
I need to find my calm again...
Please forgive my poor condition meow...
unhappy: Today's battle didn't go smoothly meow~
Maybe I was too impatient...
Next time will be better meow~

happy: Perfect fusion of mechanics! Ultimate form achieved meow~
All systems are in optimal condition meow~
Electronic core: stable meow~
I am the guardian of the future meow~
Technology makes everything better meow~
normal: Perfect fusion of mechanics! Ultimate form achieved meow~

happy: Chrome armor perfectly assembled! Final form achieved meow~
Combat capabilities have reached the peak meow~
I was born for battle! Fighting for justice meow!
Perfect combination of logic and power meow~
I've become the legendary mechanical war god meow~
normal: Chrome armor perfectly assembled! Final form achieved meow~
Combat capabilities have reached the peak meow~

Perfect combination of logic and power meow~

Might need an upgrade...
I'll fix it in the shortest time meow~

happy: I've felt the mysteries of the universe meow~
The void whispers to me meow~
The stars guide my path meow~
I've become the true king of arcane meow~
I want to share this power with you meow~
normal: I've felt the mysteries of the universe meow~

The stars guide my path meow~

miserable: With great power comes great responsibility meow...
I hope everyone can understand my efforts meow...
unhappy: The fate of the universe rests on my shoulders meow~
Need to stay calm meow~
Every decision has great impact meow~

happy: The wisdom of starlight has been fully passed to me meow~
I can interpret the trajectory of fate meow~
Your future is bright meow~
The stars are with me meow~
Let's create miracles together meow~

miserable: The stars have dimmed... is it my imagination meow...
I need to reestablish the connection...

There might be external interference...
Need to rebalance the cosmic order meow~

happy: The eternal fire has been ignited! Immortal power awakened meow~
The whole world bows to my flames meow~
The flames of justice will never be extinguished meow~
I've become the legendary flame ruler meow~
Sharing this eternal power with you meow~

The entire universe bows to my frost meow~

Sharing this frozen power with you meow~

I can freely travel through spacetime meow~

cat_fish_pond.name: Mysterious Fish Pond
cat_fish_pond.description: Your cat discovered a fish pond glowing with strange light...

outcomes.0_0: Caught a shimmering fish! Looks full of energy.
outcomes.0_1: Missed completely, got splashed with water, but had fun.
outcomes.1_0: Discovered an ancient rune stone at the bottom!
outcomes.1_1: Waited for a long time but found nothing... at least got some sun.

baby_arcane_spark.name: Magic Spark
baby_arcane_spark.description: A mysterious purple light flickers before your eyes, seeming to summon you...

outcomes.0_0: Magical energy surges into your body! You feel the call of the arcane. Arcane Affinity +10
outcomes.0_1: The spark gently surrounds you, warm and comfortable. Arcane Affinity +6
outcomes.0_2: The magic was fleeting, but left a trace behind. Arcane Affinity +3
outcomes.1_0: Saw runic patterns contained within the spark... Arcane Affinity +5
outcomes.1_1: The spark dissipated, but inner peace remains. Arcane Affinity +2

baby_feral_call.name: Call of the Wild
baby_feral_call.description: A wild roar comes from afar, making your blood boil...

outcomes.0_0: Your roar got a response! Wild power is awakening. Feral Affinity +10
outcomes.0_1: The voice was a bit immature, but the seed of wildness has been planted. Feral Affinity +6
outcomes.0_2: Only managed a meow... but the determination is there. Feral Affinity +3
outcomes.1_0: Found traces left by a powerful beast... Feral Affinity +5
outcomes.1_1: Didn't find the source, but courage has grown. Feral Affinity +2

baby_mech_glow.name: Mechanical Glow
baby_mech_glow.description: A pile of discarded mechanical parts suddenly emitted a blue glow, as if waiting for your touch...

outcomes.0_0: Electricity flows through your body, feeling a connection with machinery! Mech Affinity +10
outcomes.0_1: The parts start operating under your touch. Mech Affinity +6
outcomes.0_2: The light flickered briefly, but left a technological memory. Mech Affinity +3
outcomes.1_0: Understood the basic principles of machinery... Mech Affinity +5
outcomes.1_1: It's complex, but developed an interest in technology. Mech Affinity +2

cat_cardboard_box.name: Mysterious Cardboard Box
cat_cardboard_box.description: There's a cardboard box by the road emitting a strange aura...

outcomes.0_0: Found a glowing bead inside! The cat happily carried it out.
outcomes.0_1: The box was warm and cozy, had a nice sleep.
outcomes.0_2: The box suddenly collapsed... but no injuries.
outcomes.1_0: Discovered mysterious writing on the box... though can't read it.
outcomes.1_1: Kicked the box a bit, nothing special.

cat_butterfly.name: Chasing Butterfly
cat_butterfly.description: A faintly glowing butterfly flutters before your eyes...

outcomes.0_0: Caught it! The butterfly turned into a warm light merging into the body.
outcomes.0_1: Chased for a long time without success, tired but happy.
outcomes.0_2: Chased to a flower and smelled sweet fragrance.
outcomes.1_0: The butterfly landed on the head, surrounded by a peaceful power.
outcomes.1_1: The butterfly flew away, but the mood is calm.

arcane_ancient_library.name: Ancient Library
arcane_ancient_library.description: In the depths of data streams, discovered a virtual library constructed of magic...

outcomes.0_0: Mastered a new spell! Magic power greatly increased.
outcomes.0_1: The text in the book was too obscure, felt dizzy.
outcomes.0_2: Triggered a trap on the book! Received slight backlash.
outcomes.1_0: Recovered energy in the library's tranquility.
outcomes.1_1: Saw fragments of the future during meditation...

arcane_shadow_trial.name: Shadow Trial
arcane_shadow_trial.description: A pitch-black rift appears in the void, emanating mysterious shadow energy...

outcomes.0_0: Shadow energy surges into your body! You feel power growing. Shadow Energy +15
outcomes.0_1: Got lost in the darkness for a while, but eventually found the way out. Shadow Energy +8
outcomes.0_2: The shadow power was too turbulent, received some damage.
outcomes.1_0: Quietly absorbing the shadow's aura... Shadow Energy +5
outcomes.1_1: The rift suddenly closed, but left some shadow residue. Shadow Energy +3

arcane_crystal_trial.name: Crystal Trial
arcane_crystal_trial.description: An altar made of pure crystal shines with sacred light...

outcomes.0_0: Sacred crystal energy flows through your whole body! Feel blessed. Crystal Energy +15
outcomes.0_1: The crystal's light is warm and healing. Crystal Energy +8
outcomes.0_2: The energy was too intense, got pushed away.
outcomes.1_0: Devout prayer was answered! Crystal energy slowly increases. Crystal Energy +5
outcomes.1_1: Felt the crystal's pulse during meditation. Crystal Energy +3

feral_arena.name: Wilderness Arena
feral_arena.description: An arena constructed by elemental power appears ahead...

outcomes.0_0: Won in fierce battle! Strength greatly increased.
outcomes.0_1: Barely managed a draw, but gained valuable combat experience.
outcomes.0_2: The opponent was too strong... next time for sure!
outcomes.1_1: Watched an exciting duel, blood boiling!

feral_flame_trial.name: Flame Trial
feral_flame_trial.description: Ahead lies a burning volcanic zone, the air filled with scorching heat...

outcomes.0_0: Found the essence of fire! Flame power surges through the body. Fire Power +18
outcomes.0_1: Trained by the lava river, absorbed flame power. Fire Power +10
outcomes.0_2: Lava erupted, barely escaped! Fire Power +5
outcomes.1_0: Quietly feeling the pulse of flames... Fire Power +8
outcomes.1_1: Absorbed some scattered fire sparks. Fire Power +5

feral_frost_trial.name: Frost Trial
feral_frost_trial.description: A peak covered in eternal ice appears before your eyes, cold wind howling...

outcomes.0_0: Successfully reached the summit! Received the blessing of the frozen heart. Frost Power +18
outcomes.0_1: Discovered frost crystals on the mountainside. Frost Power +10
outcomes.0_2: Encountered a blizzard, forced to retreat. Frost Power +5
outcomes.1_0: Merged with the ice element... Frost Power +8
outcomes.1_1: Felt the tranquility of frost. Frost Power +5

mech_cyber_trial.name: Cyber Trial
mech_cyber_trial.description: Entered virtual data space, countless data streams flowing around...

outcomes.0_0: Successfully parsed encrypted data! Cyber data greatly increased. Cyber Data +16
outcomes.0_1: Drifted in the data ocean, absorbed some information. Cyber Data +9
outcomes.0_2: Encountered a firewall, barely escaped. Cyber Data +4
outcomes.1_0: Established stable data channel... Cyber Data +8
outcomes.1_1: Downloaded some data packets. Cyber Data +5

mech_chrome_trial.name: Chrome Trial
mech_chrome_trial.description: Discovered an abandoned space station made of rare alloys...

outcomes.0_0: Found large quantities of high-grade chrome alloy! Chrome Alloy +16
outcomes.0_1: Recovered some usable alloy parts. Chrome Alloy +9
outcomes.0_2: Alloy quality is poor, but better than nothing. Chrome Alloy +4
outcomes.1_0: Understood the alloy formula! Chrome Alloy +8
outcomes.1_1: Scanned some sample data. Chrome Alloy +5

mech_scrapyard.name: Stellar Scrapyard
mech_scrapyard.description: Discovered a junkyard scattered with high-tech wreckage...

outcomes.0_0: Found an advanced processor! System performance improved.
outcomes.0_1: Picked up some ordinary parts, better than nothing.
outcomes.1_0: Scanned an encrypted stellar navigation chart!
outcomes.1_1: All data was corrupted... but the scanning system got calibrated.
